name: Save the Butterflies
description:
This game was created for WeeklyGameJam 246

All of your butterfly friends have been captured by a ferious spider. Maneuver through the spiderwebs, without getting caught yourself and free your friends.
Info: Game does not consists actual spiders, only spiderwebs.

Controls:
[W][A][S][D] - Movement
[E] - Ascend
[Q] - Descend
[Esc]/[P] - Open menu

Developer notes:
I planned on trying to work on Character Modelling for this game jam, but the topic did not give me the possibility to do so in the matter I envisioned.
Focused on learning Unreal Materials and Foliage, I have concentrated more on visuals than gameplay, so only one simple level got finished.
But my GameSettings-template gets more and more sophisticated, so I got that going at least.
